title: Manhattan: An American Life
description: Jon Osterman was the victim of an atomic mishap and emerged an immortal god, impervious to the passage of time. This docuseries explores the legacy of this literally self-made man in hopes of understanding why he was here, and why he left.
altHero: drawing of Dr. Manhattan on the moon with an American astronaut
alt1: a black and white photo of a young boy and his father
alt2: a collage-style portrait of Dr. Manhattan with his face crossed out and the text “American Cancer”
alt3: a chain link fence with a hole in it and a sign that reads “Gila Flats test site keep out
alt4: a giant Dr. Manhattan walks along the Vietnam battlefields
